name: 40-in-1 Explosive Megamix
synopsis: Do you like arcade games - puzzles, action and shooting games? Then this is just what you have been waiting for! 40 games in one collection! Choose between classic games like Sudoku, Match-3 and Cooking games, and try out new and completely original fun games in various genres. Amazing graphics and all the unique DS features will provide hours and hours of fun - what could be better? 40 minigames in different genres, amazing graphics and all the unique Nintendo DS features!
